typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Data_XMLFormat as string,
		ID as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	unquotedColumnNames: true,
	wildcardPaths:['*.json']) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		FileName,
		AccountNumber = ID,
		name = Data_XMLFormat
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
